name: R5-ObservationDefinition-R4B-ObservationDefinition
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ObservationDefinition into FHIR R4B

element.display: Definition of an observation

target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ObservationDefinition`

target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.code` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ObservationDefinition.code`
